divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching a lot of airplane and helicopter activity from my balcony, and commenting to my daughter that there are a lot of planes out tonight, when i saw this pass practically in front of me. didn't realize what i was seeing at first,thought it was a plane since there were so many flying tonight. but as it got closer and i noticed the strange blinking red light on bottom, i grabbed my camera and caught this video as it was moving away from me.it was pretty big and totally silent.black triangle shape with three white solid lights on each corner and a blinking red light on bottom in center.it continued to travel straight and out of sight but i couldn't bend far enough over balcony to film it. never seen anything like it before.
Summary: watching a lot of plane and helicopter activity when i saw this object
